title: How to Make Cream Soup Base or Foundation

steps.headline: Add the milk to a double boiler.
Add the chopped onion to the milk in the double boiler.
Scald the milk with the onion.
Melt the butter in a saucepan and then whisk in the flour.
Add 1 cup of hot milk mixture to the flour mixture.
Whisk to combine and cook until thickened.
Add the flour mixture to the remaining milk in the double boiler.
Add the remaining ingredients and stir well.
Add your favorite vegetable or cooked meat to the soup base.
steps.description: Try 2 cups sliced and sauteed celery. Try sliced cooked mushrooms. Add leftover cooked and diced chicken.

text: Add the milk to a double boiler.  Add the chopped onion to the milk in the double boiler.  Scald the milk with the onion.  Melt the butter in a saucepan and then whisk in the flour.  Cook until bubbly and thickened.  Add 1 cup of hot milk mixture to the flour mixture.  Whisk to combine and cook until thickened.  Add the flour mixture to the remaining milk in the double boiler.  Add the remaining ingredients and stir well.  Add your favorite vegetable or cooked meat to the soup base. Try 2 cups sliced and sauteed celery. Try sliced cooked mushrooms. Add leftover cooked and diced chicken. Finished.
